page.title: 09Irvine bowling competitions
page.content: {Competitions}are held within each club for champions and so on. The winners in singles, pairs, triples and rinks go out to compete against other clubs in the{Scottish championships}and the runners-up compete in the{Ayrshire {championships.}Each club also has a weekly mixed{wapenshaw}competition. All the clubs play against one another in a league competition and there are other trophies which they compete for. Every year a big competition takes place on the first Thursday in July between all the{Ayrshire clubs}and the {Glasgow clubs.}This year the competition is to be held in Glasgow and over{2000}bowlers will take part. { }
